br.uff.midiacom.ana.rule
Class NCLRuleBase<T extends NCLElement,Et extends NCLTestRule,Ei extends NCLImportBase,R extends ExternalReferenceType>

All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLElement<T>, XMLElement<T>
public class NCLRuleBase<T extends NCLElement,Et extends NCLTestRule,Ei extends NCLImportBase,R extends ExternalReferenceType>
extends NCLBase<T,Ei>

Class that represents a base of rules. Those rules can be simple or composite rules.
This element defines the attributes:

  • id - id of the base of rules. This attribute is optional.

This element has as children the elements:
  • importBase - element that imports a rule base defined in another NCL document. The base can have none or several import elements.
  • rule - element representing a simple rule inside the base. The base can have none or several rule elements.
  • compositeRule - element representing a composite rule inside the base. The base can have none or several composite rule elements.
Note that the base of rules must have at least one child element, which can be a import, a simple or a composite rule.

addRule

public boolean addRule(Et rule)
                throws XMLException
Adds a rule to the base of rules. The rule can be a simple rule or a composite rule. The base of rules can have none or several rules.

Parameters:
rule - element representing a rule. This rule can be a simple rule or a composite rule.
Returns:
true if the rule was added.
Throws:
XMLException - if the element representing the rule is null.
